title: Paintballing Experience With Equipment Hire and Lunch for £3.50 at Warminster Activity Centre (£20 Value)
highlights:
• Includes paintball equipment
  • Lunch of burger and chips
  • Set in 50 acres of woodland
  • Sessions run 10am-4pm
  • Available 7 days a week

title: Outdoor Grass Tennis For Up To Four for £6 at Monkton Leisure (£30 Value)
highlights:
• Named in the Times Top 10 most picturesque sports grounds
  • Well-kept court
  • Open seven days a week
  • Free parking available

title: Course of Three 1 Hour Microdermabrasion Facial Treatments (£59.50) or Full Body Microdermabrasion Treatments (£78) at The Retreat
highlights:
• Treatment combines microdermabrasion, thermotherapy, ultrasound, an ultrasound skin peeler, biolift, LED light therapy and cryotherapy
  • Course of three treatments, each lasting one hour
  • Available as a course for the face; or back, buttocks, legs and stomach
  • Aims to refresh and soften skin, while also stimulating circulation
